DeepClean
============

.. include:: ../README.rst

Features
-----------
- Single package for multi modal data pre-processing and cleaning.
- Fast Experimentation
- Modularity in the data (processing) pipeline
- Implements techniques like:
  - Normalization
  - Tokenization
  - Augmentation
  - Denoising
  - and much more.

Installation
--------------
.. code-block:: python

   pip install deepclean
